speech:
Our Spa & Ayurveda Therapy courses blend ancient practices with modern techniques. Here’s a quick overview:

1. International Certificate in Ancient Therapies (2 weeks)
2. Universal Certificate in Spa & Ayurveda Therapies (1 month)
3. International Certificate in Spa Therapies & Management (1 month)
4. International Certificate in Ayurveda Therapies (1 month + 15 days)
5. International Graduate in Advanced Spa Therapies & Management (2 months)
6. International Master in Ultra Spa Management & Ayurveda Therapies (3 months)
